final_plan.description:
Task: Implement user registration functionality
Task Description: Create user registration API endpo...
functional_requirements: Create a POST /api/auth/register endpoint that accepts email, password, and confirm_password.
Implement password validation to ensure it includes a minimum of 8 characters, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
Ensure email validation checks for proper format and uniqueness.
Hash the password using bcrypt before storing it in the database.
Store user data in the database with a created_at timestamp.
Return a JWT token upon successful registration.
Return appropriate error messages for validation failures.
Include comprehensive unit tests for all scenarios.
Update API documentation with endpoint details.

steps.title: Create User Model
steps.description: Define the User model schema with Mongoose for user data storage.

sub_steps.title: Define User schema
sub_steps.description: Create a Mongoose schema for the User model with fields for email, password, and timestamps.

sub_steps.title: Implement unique email validation
sub_steps.description: Add a unique index on the email field to ensure no duplicate registrations.

steps.title: Create User Repository
steps.description: Implement data access methods for user-related operations.

sub_steps.title: Implement findByEmail method
sub_steps.description: Create a method to find a user by email in the User repository.

sub_steps.title: Implement create method
sub_steps.description: Create a method to save a new user to the database.

steps.title: Implement User Registration Service
steps.description: Create the business logic for user registration including validation and password hashing.

sub_steps.title: Implement user registration logic
sub_steps.description: Create a service method to handle user registration, including email uniqueness and password hashing.

sub_steps.title: Generate JWT token
sub_steps.description: Generate a JWT token upon successful registration.

steps.title: Create User Registration Controller
steps.description: Implement the controller to handle registration requests and responses.

sub_steps.title: Implement registerUser method
sub_steps.description: Create a controller method to handle the registration request and return appropriate responses.

sub_steps.title: Handle errors and responses
sub_steps.description: Ensure proper error handling and response formatting in the controller.

steps.title: Define User Registration Routes
steps.description: Set up the API endpoint for user registration.

sub_steps.title: Create auth route
sub_steps.description: Define the POST /api/auth/register route in the Express router.

sub_steps.title: Add validation middleware
sub_steps.description: Integrate request validation middleware to validate input data.

steps.title: Implement Input Validation
steps.description: Use Joi to validate user input for registration.

sub_steps.title: Define validation schema
sub_steps.description: Create a Joi schema to validate email, password, and confirm_password.

sub_steps.title: Implement validation middleware
sub_steps.description: Create a middleware function to validate incoming requests against the schema.

steps.title: Write Unit Tests
steps.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the registration functionality.

sub_steps.title: Test successful registration
sub_steps.description: Write tests to verify successful user registration and token generation.

sub_steps.title: Test validation errors
sub_steps.description: Write tests to check for various validation errors (invalid email, weak password, etc.).

steps.title: Update API Documentation
steps.description: Document the new registration endpoint and its requirements.

execution_order: Within each step, execute sub-steps in order
Test after each sub-step before proceeding
Commit code after each completed sub-step
